description.displayText:
Jessica is a wonderful babysitter! She is always willing to do any activity my toddler wants to do (even jumping in muddy puddles)! She is kind, patient and very well mannered. My two and half year old loves her. She also comes with fun art activities to do. 

Jessica is on time and is always easy to get in touch with. 

We are very happy with Jessica and hope to have her as a babysitter for a very long time!

Jessica is a wonderful babysitter! She is always willing to do any activity my toddler wants to do (even jumping in muddy puddles)! She is kind, patient and very well mannered. My two and half year old loves her. She also comes with fun art activities to do. 

Jessica is on time and is always easy to get in touch with. 

We are very happy with Jessica and hope to have her as a babysitter for a very long time!

description.displayText: Jessica is my grand daughter and as a young girl she worked for me in our business during the summers back in early 2000's.  Although, as a young girl and related to me, she did not let it prevent her from doing a good job for me.  She was thorough, dedicated, willing to learn and precise in her work.  She showed me that she would grow up to have good work ethics.  As a grown up she has tackled certain endeavors and with hard work and determination has always accomplished what she set out to do.  She is a hard worker, honest, dependable, patient, compassionate and has a good heart. She does not allow outside influences interfere with what she has to do. If we still had our business and had not sold it, I would certainly love to give her a permanent position.  All young girls should be like her. Good employees are hard to find these days and anyone who employs her will not be sorry.
